projects.name: Evento
projects.desc: Event Tracking React app using Context API

projects.name: Code Hours
features: Widget that you can integrate in your websites
projects.idea: I wanted to create a platform where developers can track their coding hours and compete with other developers. I also wanted to create a widget that can be integrated in any website to show the coding time and activity of the developer.
challenges: Thinking of a way to track the coding time of the user and keep track on the the daily time in IST timezone while using the UTC time zone because that is what MONGODB and JS stores time in by default.

I first thought of sending a time document to the server with every log request but that would be too much data and would be a lot of work for the server to handle. There instead of tracking the coding time of last 24 hours, I decieded to reset daily time at 12:00 AM IST
I had to learn how to create a VS Code Extension
I had to learn how to create a CDN widget that can be integrated in any website

projects.name: CloakCampus
projects.desc: A social media for University Students
features: Use email: 'user@sampleUniversity.ac.in' and password: 'User_56_' to login as a dummy student at a dummy university.
Completly Anonymouse Social media for university students where they can interact with their peers and express their critical opinions without any fear of being judged.
Username and Profile pictures gets randomly generated and assigned to the user with each login to keep the user completly anonymous
Email Verification is required to create an account to make sure only students from whitelisted universities with valid university email can join the platform
All the features like posting, commenting, liking, notification etc. are available
Admin Panel is also available to blacklist the suspicious users and delete inappropriate posts based on the Reports made by the users.
Images can be rotated before posting
projects.idea: I wanted to create a platform where university students can interact with their peers and express their critical opinions, confess and have a community without any fear of being judged. Though it sounds like reddit or some another social media platform, the main USP is the simplicity of the app and that only your college mates can see your posts.
challenges: I had to learn how to create a PWA because a webapp would have a high churn rate which I wanted to avoid.
Initially I also had video and audio posting feature but I had to remove it because it was taking too much space and memory on the server.
I had to learn how to store cache on Redis
I had to learn how to create a JWT token
I had to learn how to create a Multer middleware to upload images
I had to learn how to store media on Cloudinary

projects.name: Yomimori
projects.desc: AI based Japanese reading and learning app
features: User can create stories and articles tailored to their proficency level and interested genres using AI
User can execc to Dictionary in realtime by clicking on any word in the article
Admin can also create stories and articles for the users as 'Archived Content'.
More features like flashcards, quizzes, etc. are coming soon.
projects.idea: I wanted to create a platform where people can read and learn Japanese in a fun and interactive way. I also wanted to create a platform where people can create their own stories and articles and share it with the community.
challenges: I had to learn how to fetch a dictionary to my database through an XML file using scripts.
I had to learn how to integrate GEMINI API

projects.name: AtoZ Home Services
projects.idea: This was Capstone project inluced in my course work at IIT-Madras under my Bachelor of Science in Data Science and Programming Degree. I got a PERFECT SCORE of 100/100 in this project.
features: User can book services like Plumber, Electrician, Carpenter, etc.
User can also register as a service provider
Admin can see the booking and assign the service provider to the user
challenges: I had pushed the project to the very last minute due to some other commitments and hence had to finish this project in 2 days.
I had 2 days and thus had to learn everything about flask, jinja, sqlite in 2 days.
Due to the very tight time constraint, I had to sacrifice the UI UX of the project.
